original_text: If any man teach otherwise, and consent not to wholesome words, even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which is according to godliness;
korean_text: 누구든지 다른 교훈을 하며 바른 말 곧 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 말씀과 경건에 관한 교훈을 따르지 아니하면

sentences.original_text: and consent not to wholesome words
even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ
and to the doctrine which is according to godliness
